mapper.select: SELECT BIG_CATE FROM CATEGORY GROUP BY BIG_CATE
SELECT MID_CATE FROM CATEGORY WHERE BIG_CATE='${bigCate}' GROUP BY MID_CATE
SELECT SMALL_CATE FROM CATEGORY WHERE BIG_CATE = #{bigCate} AND MID_CATE = #{midCate} GROUP BY SMALL_CATE

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT STATION_NUM, STATION_NAME, LINE_NAME, LATITUDE, LONGITDE, ADDRESS, (6371 * ACOS( COS(#{lat} * 3.14159265359 / 180) * COS(LATITUDE * 3.14159265359 / 180) * COS((LONGITDE * 3.14159265359 / 180) - (#{lng} * 3.14159265359 / 180)) + SIN(#{lat} * 3.14159265359 / 180) * SIN(LATITUDE * 3.14159265359 / 180) )) AS distance FROM STATION ORDER BY distance ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT S.STATION_NUM, S.STATION_NAME, S.LINE_NAME, S.LATITUDE, S.LONGITDE, S.ADDRESS FROM STATION S WHERE S.STATION_NUM IN ( SELECT TS.STATION_NUM FROM TRADE_STATION TS WHERE TS.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND TS.PD_NUM = #{pdNum} )
